testsuite.name: Chrome Headless 129.0.0.0 (Mac OS 10.15.7)

property.name: browser.fullName

testcase.name: AddemployeeComponent should call updateEmployee service method if employee is being edited
AddemployeeComponent should not allow creating an employee if the name exceeds 100 characters
AddemployeeComponent should not allow creating an employee if the name is too short
AddemployeeComponent should not allow creating an employee if the name contains numbers
AddemployeeComponent should not allow editing an employee if the name is duplicated
AddemployeeComponent should not allow creating an employee if the name is duplicated
AddemployeeComponent should call createEmployee service method if validation passes
AddemployeeComponent should format the employee name correctly
